result.execSummary:
The defendant Jonathan M Meyer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jonathan M Meyer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jonathan M Meyer was found guilty of OWI (2nd) [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:26 a.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Court recites agreement - defendant will plea to OWI-2nd offense as repeater and counts 2 & 3 will be dismissed.  State concurs.  Atty Privat concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty and as repeater.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 as charged.  Court orders count 2 be dismissed outright and orders count 3 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Privat.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-30 days county jail, consecutive to any other sentence with huber and to commence immediately.
-$500 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Blood Draw Fee - $42.50
-DL revocation for 15 months
-IID - 15 months
-AODA and any follow-up (Marquette)
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 10:35 a.m.
Marquette County Jail - 03/15/2016 at 9:30 a.m. (Plea & Sentencing)
Plea/sentencing hearing at 03-15-2016 10:00 am

10:59 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - defendant is still in Marquette County jail.  Statement by defendant - refused to sign the bond.  Statement by Atty Privat - has an offer.  Court sets for Plea & Sentencing on March 15, 2016 at 10:00 A.M.

Court ajdourned at 11:00 a.m.
Status hearing at 01-19-2016 10:00 am

10:40 a.m.  No appearance by the defendant.  Attorney Barb Privat present.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Privat - has received Discovery and has not reviewed it and also defendant is in the Marquette County jail and will be there for awhile.  Court sets for Status Hearing on January 19, 2016 at 10:00 a.m

Court adjourned at 10:40 a.m.
State's
Signature bond - Defendant REFUSED to sign
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

1:24 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court with Atty Barb Privat.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Privat confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Atty Privat enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court will set for Status Hearing on December 14, 2015 at 10:00 a.m.

Sentencing After Revocation - 2015CF53 & 2015CM41

Atty Privat has received a copy of the revocation packet with no corrections, additions or deletions.  State has received a copy of the revocation packet with no corrections, additions or deletions.  Sentencing statement by DA Christenson.  Sentencing statement by Atty Privat.  No statement by defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

2015CF53

Count 2 - 9 months county jail, with huber and concurrent to 2015CM41.  Court orders the court costs of $443.00 be reduced to a civil judgement. 

Count 4 - 90 days county jail with huber and consecutive to any other sentence.  Court orders the court costs of $443.00 be reduced to a civil judgment.

2015CM41

Count 1 - 9 months county jail - with huber and to commence immediately.  

Court orders court costs of $443.00 be reduced to a civil judgment.

Court grants the defendant 53 days of sentence credit.

Court adjourned at 1:33 p.m.
